# Release v1.8.1: Streamlined PDF Editor UI

## üéØ Overview
This release significantly improves the PDF Editor user experience by streamlining the interface to show only the selected function at a time, eliminating the previous cluttered display of all functions simultaneously.

## ‚ú® UI Improvements

### Streamlined PDF Editor Dialog
- **Clean, Focused Interface**: Shows only the selected PDF operation (merge, split, compress, etc.)
- **No More Clutter**: Removed the confusing "all functions crammed into single form" layout
- **Smooth Animations**: Added fade-in animation when switching between functions
- **Optimized Sizing**: Dialog now has max-width of 600px and max-height of 85vh for better fit
- **Better Visual Hierarchy**: Improved spacing and organization of form elements

### Enhanced Styling
- **File List Display**: Better styling for merge operation file lists with improved contrast
- **Interactive Elements**: Enhanced buttons with proper hover states and colors
- **Dark Mode Support**: Complete dark theme support for all PDF editor components
- **Responsive Design**: Better scrolling and overflow handling for smaller screens

## üîß Technical Details

### Architecture
- Maintained existing show/hide logic (already working correctly in previous versions)
- Added `.pdf-editor-content` and `.pdf-editor-body` CSS classes for better specificity
- Implemented smooth `@keyframes fadeIn` animation for section transitions
- Improved overflow and scrolling behavior

### Theme Compatibility
- Full support for all 22 existing themes
- Proper color contrast in both light and dark modes
- Consistent styling across all theme variations

## üì¶ Available Downloads

Choose the package that suits your needs:

1. **PanConverter-Setup-1.8.1.exe** (Recommended)
   - Full installer with uninstaller
   - File associations and Start Menu shortcuts
   - ~104 MB

2. **PanConverter-1.8.1-x64.exe**
   - Portable executable, no installation required
   - Run directly from any folder
   - ~104 MB

3. **PanConverter-1.8.1-x64.zip**
   - ZIP archive with unpacked application
   - For manual extraction and deployment
   - ~145 MB (uncompressed files)

## üöÄ What''s Changed

### User Experience
- PDF Editor dialog now shows only relevant controls for selected operation
- Eliminated confusion from seeing all 10+ operations at once
- Clearer workflow: Select menu item ‚Üí See only that function ‚Üí Complete task
- Improved form readability and reduced cognitive load

### Operations Supported
All 10 PDF operations now have streamlined, focused interfaces:
- ‚úÖ Merge PDFs
- ‚úÖ Split PDF
- ‚úÖ Compress PDF
- ‚úÖ Rotate Pages
- ‚úÖ Delete Pages
- ‚úÖ Reorder Pages
- ‚úÖ Add Watermark
- ‚úÖ Password Protection (Encrypt)

- ‚úÖ Set Permissions

## üìù Installation Instructions

### Using the Installer (Recommended)

2. Run the installer
3. Follow the installation wizard
4. Launch from Start Menu or Desktop shortcut

### Using Portable Version

2. Save to any folder (e.g., Documents, Desktop)
3. Double-click to run (no installation needed)
4. Create your own shortcut if desired

If upgrading from v1.8.0 or earlier:

- Recent files list will remain intact
- Word template selections will be maintained

None in this release (focused on UI/UX improvements)

# Release v1.9.0: Custom Headers & Footers for All Exports

## üéØ Overview
This release introduces comprehensive header and footer customization for all standard export formats (PDF, DOCX, ODT, PPTX), allowing users to add professional branding, page numbers, and dynamic content to their exported documents.

## ‚ú® New Features

### üìã Custom Headers & Footers System
- **Three-Column Layout**: Position content left, center, or right in headers and footers
- **Custom Text Fields**: Add any text to header/footer positions
- **Logo/Image Support**: Upload and embed logos in headers or footers
- **Dynamic Fields**: Automatically insert document information:
  - `$PAGE$` - Current page number
  - `$TOTAL$` - Total page count
  - `$DATE$` - Current date
  - `$TIME$` - Current time
  - `$TITLE$` - Document title
  - `$AUTHOR$` - Document author
  - `$FILENAME$` - File name
- **Enable/Disable Toggle**: Quick on/off for headers and footers
- **Persistent Settings**: Preferences saved across sessions
- **Field Picker Dialog**: Easy insertion of dynamic fields with button clicks

### üìÅ Format Support
- ‚úÖ **PDF**: Headers/footers with LaTeX fancyhdr package
- ‚úÖ **DOCX (Standard)**: Word document XML manipulation
- ‚úÖ **ODT**: LibreOffice format support
- ‚úÖ **PPTX**: PowerPoint slide footers
- ‚úÖ **Batch Conversion**: Full header/footer support in batch mode

**Note**: Enhanced exports (DOCX Enhanced, PDF Enhanced) use Word templates which already have their own headers/footers defined in the template itself.

### üîß Technical Enhancements
- **Logo Storage**: Images stored in userData directory for persistence
- **LaTeX Integration**: Professional PDF headers using fancyhdr package

- **Page Numbering**: Automatic page number fields for all formats

- **Technical**: Use webUtils.getPathForFile when file.path is unavailable

### Header/Footer Visibility Fix
